blocking_issues.description: functional defects identified by the council. Key issues include: 1) The janitor processes ('deduplication.py', 'contradiction.py') modify memory metadata in the fallback path but fail to persist these changes to the storage provider, resulting in 'invalidated' counts incrementing without actual data changes. 2) The evaluation harness implementing flawed metric logic where False Positives and False Negatives are indistinguishable from general failures, rendering the metrics meaningless. 3) Silent exception swallowing in critical loops which masks errors."
